definition: sloping channel through which things can descend, to jump from an airplane and descend with a parachute
details:
noun
- sloping channel through which things can descend
= synonyms: slide
- rescue equipment consisting of a device that fills with air and retards your fall
= synonyms: parachute
verb
- to jump from an airplane and descend with a parachute
= example: to jump from an airplane and descend with a parachute
= synonyms: jump
